data.persona: I am a traveler.  I travel from city to city finding work where I can while enjoying the local cuisine.  I don't put down roots.  I come and go as I please, much like the wind.
data.description:
You are in the Bright Path.
The bright path is lined with roses, lavender, daisies, and lilies. Apple trees sit on a pristinely-manicured lawn. Hedges in geometric shapes sit just beyond the path. The path leads away from the castle and down to a pond full of fish and swans.
There's a witch's broom, a fish, and a swamp flower here.
A witch is here.

You are carrying a block and tackle, and wearing a ripped shirt.

data.short_motivation: I need to drop the block and tackle so I can better inspect the witch's broom and other nearby objects to determine the witch's power
data.mid_motivation: I have to make it safely to the end of the Bright Path today
data.long_motivation: There's an awesome friar flute music festival happening in Sandalwood that I don't want to miss

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: steal block and tackle from King's engineer
